types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: ID
types.description: The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"4"`) or integer (such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

types.name: Int
types.description: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: JSON
types.description: The `JSON` scalar type represents JSON values as specified by [ECMA-404](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/files/ECMA-ST/ECMA-404.pdf).

types.name: String
types.description: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: SwellAttribute
types.description: Attribute

fields.name: default
fields.description: Default value used when entering a value for the attribute.

fields.name: filterable
fields.description: Indicates if the category is available in the storefront category page filters.

fields.name: multi
fields.description: When attribute `type=image` is indicated, the attribute contains multiple images.

fields.name: name
fields.description: A human-friendly name for the attribute.

fields.name: searchable
fields.description: Indicates if this attribute is searchable on the backend.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Input type used when entering a value for the attribute.

fields.name: values
fields.description: List of the attribute's associated select options used with attribute `type` of `checkbox`, `radio`, or `select`.

fields.name: visible
fields.description: Indicates the attribute is visible to customers.

types.name: SwellCart
types.description: Cart

fields.name: abandoned
fields.description: Indicates the cart was abandoned after 3 hours of inactivity. After being marked as abandoned, this field is automatically set back to `false` after an update to items, billing, or shipping info.

fields.name: abandonedNotifications
fields.description: Number of abandoned cart notifications sent to the customer.

fields.name: accountCreditAmount
fields.description: Amount of customer's account credit applied for initial payment, if applicable.

fields.name: accountCreditApplied
fields.description: Indicates the customer's account credit is applied to the initial payment.

fields.name: accountId
fields.description: ID of the customer's account.

fields.name: accountInfoSaved
fields.description: Indicates the customer chose to save shipping and billing information to their account when submitting the order.

fields.name: accountLoggedIn
fields.description: Indicates the customer was logged into their account when placing the order.

fields.name: billing
fields.description: The customer's billing details. Defaults to `account.billing`. Updating billing will also update the corresponding account billing object.

fields.name: checkoutId
fields.description: Customer-facing unique identifier for the cart used in URLs and for abandoned cart recovery.

fields.name: checkoutUrl
fields.description: URL to checkout for the cart, set automatically when the cart has at least `items`, `shipping`, or `billing` details set. Can also be set explicitly when creating or updating the cart for custom checkouts.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Customer notes provided when placing the order, if any.

fields.name: couponCode
fields.description: Coupon code applied to the cart.

fields.name: couponId
fields.description: ID of the coupon applied to the cart.

fields.name: currencyRate
fields.description: Currency percentage used in calculating the fixed amount.

fields.name: dateAbandoned
fields.description: Date the cart was or will be marked as abandoned.

fields.name: dateAbandonedNext
fields.description: Next date the cart will be marked as abandoned when using a series of abandoned cart recovery notices (advanced cart recovery).

fields.name: discountTotal
fields.description: Total discount amount.

fields.name: discounts
fields.description: List of discounts applied to the cart.

fields.name: displayCurrency
fields.description: Three-letter [ISO currency code](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html) representing the user's preferred display currency, if applicable.

fields.name: displayLocale
fields.description: Locale code representing the user's preferred display locale, if applicable.

fields.name: gift
fields.description: Indicates the order is intended as a gift for the recipient.

fields.name: giftMessage
fields.description: Optional message to include with the order when shipping to the recipient.

fields.name: giftcardDelivery
fields.description: Indicates the cart has at least one line item with     `delivery=giftcard`.

fields.name: giftcardTotal
fields.description: Total payment amount applied to the order from `giftcards`.

fields.name: giftcards
fields.description: List of gift cards applied to the cart.

fields.name: grandTotal
fields.description: Grand total including items, shipping, and taxes.

fields.name: guest
fields.description: Indicates the customer was not logged in when placing the order.

fields.name: itemDiscount
fields.description: Total discount applied to line items.

fields.name: itemQuantity
fields.description: Total quantity of all line items.

fields.name: itemShipmentWeight
fields.description: Total shipping weight of all line items.

fields.name: itemTax
fields.description: Total taxes applied to line items.

fields.name: itemTaxIncluded
fields.description: Indicates line item prices include taxes.

fields.name: items
fields.description: List of line items describing the products ordered.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Arbitrary data, typically set in a checkout flow to store custom values. See Frontend API for more details.

fields.name: orderId
fields.description: ID of the the converted order, if applicable.

fields.name: promotionIds
fields.description: List of promotion IDs applied to the cart.

fields.name: purchaseLinksErrors
fields.description: List of purchase link errors applied to the cart. Added when clicking on the purchase link, if any resources are blocking the creation of the cart.

fields.name: recovered
fields.description: Indicates the cart was recovered and converted to an order after being abandoned.

fields.name: shipmentDelivery
fields.description: Indicates the cart has at least one line item with   `delivery=shipment`.

fields.name: shipmentDiscount
fields.description: Shipping discount applied by coupons, promotions, or custom logic.

fields.name: shipmentPrice
fields.description: Total shipping price before discounts.

fields.name: shipmentRating
fields.description: Object describing the shipping services and rates available for the cart. Shipping `country` must be set before retrieving shipping rates.

fields.name: shipmentTax
fields.description: Shipping tax amount, if applicable.

fields.name: shipmentTaxIncluded
fields.description: Indicates shipping total includes taxes, if applicable.

fields.name: shipmentTotal
fields.description: Total shipping price after discounts.

fields.name: shipping
fields.description: The customer's shipping details. Defaults to `account.shipping`. Updating shipping will also update the corresponding account shipping object.

fields.name: subTotal
fields.description: Sum of all line items before discounts, taxes and shipping.

fields.name: subscriptionDelivery
fields.description: Indicates the cart has at least one line item with `delivery=subscription`.

fields.name: taxIncludedTotal
fields.description: Total with shipping and item taxes included. Allows for an alternate display style, as normally `sub_total` and `tax_total` are shown separately.

fields.name: taxTotal
fields.description: Total tax amount applied to the cart including line items and shipping.

fields.name: taxes
fields.description: List of taxes applied to the cart.

fields.name: taxesFixed
fields.description: Indicates the order is tax-exempt. Taxes will not be calculated or applied when true.

fields.name: test
fields.description: Indicates the cart was made in test mode.

types.description: The customer's billing details. Defaults to `account.billing`. Updating billing will also update the corresponding account billing object.

fields.name: quantityTotal
fields.description: Bundled Quantity

fields.name: dateEnd
fields.description: Date the promo ends and is no longer available. When defined, the promo will not be applied after this date.

fields.name: dateStart
fields.description: Date the promo is first available. When defined, the promo will not be valid until after this date and before `date_end`.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief description of the promo, as it may be displayed to customers.

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short descriptive name of the promo.

types.name: SwellCartPurchaseLinksError
types.description: List of purchase link errors applied to the cart. Added when clicking on the purchase link, if any resources are blocking the creation of the cart.

types.name: SwellCartShipmentRating
types.description: Object describing the shipping services and rates available for the cart. Shipping `country` must be set before retrieving shipping rates.

types.name: SwellCartShipping
types.description: The customer's shipping details. Defaults to `account.shipping`. Updating shipping will also update the corresponding account shipping object.

types.name: SwellCategory
types.description: Category

fields.name: description
fields.description: A long-form description of the category. Can contain HTML or other markup languages.

fields.name: image
fields.description: Image depicting the category.

fields.name: images
fields.description: List of images depicting the category.

fields.name: metaDescription
fields.description: Page description used for search engine optimization purposes.

fields.name: metaKeywords
fields.description: Page keywords used for search engine optimization purposes.

fields.name: name
fields.description: A human-friendly name for the category.

fields.name: parentId
fields.description: ID of the parent category, if applicable.

fields.name: slug
fields.description: Unique identifier typically used in URLs. Defaults to `name` converted to lowercase and hyphenated. If the category has a parent, the default slug will be prefixed with the parent slug. Maximum length of 1,000 characters.

fields.name: sort
fields.description: Position of the category in a list.

fields.name: sorting
fields.description: Default product sorting applied when retrieving products using the `category` or `categories` filter. Can be one of `popularity`, `price_asc`, `price_desc`, `date_asc`. `date_desc`. If not specified, products are sorted by their manually defined `sort` value.

fields.name: topId
fields.description: ID of the top level category in the hierarchy.

types.name: SwellCategoryImage
types.description: List of images depicting the category.

types.name: SwellContentPage
types.description: Page

types.name: SwellContentQuiz
types.description: Quiz

types.name: SwellContentTestContent
types.description: Test-Content

types.name: SwellOrder
types.description: Order

fields.name: accountCreditAmount
fields.description: Amount of customer's account credit applied for initial payment, if applicable.

fields.name: accountCreditApplied
fields.description: Indicates the customers account credit is applied when submitting the order.

fields.name: accountId
fields.description: The `id` of the customer's account. During checkout, customer accounts without a password are designated as `guest=true`.

fields.name: accountInfoSaved
fields.description: Indicates the customer chose to save shipping and billing information to their account when submitting the order.

fields.name: accountLoggedIn
fields.description: Indicates the customer was logged into their account when placing the order.

fields.name: billing
fields.description: The customer's billing details. Defaults to `account.billing`. Updating billing will also update the corresponding account billing object.

fields.name: canceled
fields.description: Indicates the order was completely canceled.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Customer notes provided when placing the order, if any.

fields.name: couponCode
fields.description: Coupon code applied to the order.

fields.name: currencyBase
fields.description: The stores base currency.

fields.name: currencyRate
fields.description: Currency percentage used in calculating the fixed amount.

fields.name: delivered
fields.description: Indicates the order was completely fulfilled. Always `true` when `delivery_marked=true`, otherwise depends on the sum of `shipments`, `giftcards`, and `subscriptions`.

fields.name: discountTotal
fields.description: Total discount amount.

fields.name: discounts
fields.description: List of discounts applied to the order.

fields.name: gift
fields.description: Indicates the order is intended as a gift for the recipient.

fields.name: giftMessage
fields.description: Optional message to include with the order when shipping to the recipient.

fields.name: giftcardDelivery
fields.description: Indicates the order has at least one line item with `delivery=giftcard`.

fields.name: giftcardTotal
fields.description: Total payment amount applied to the order from `giftcards`.

fields.name: giftcards
fields.description: List of gift cards applied to the order.

fields.name: grandTotal
fields.description: Grand total including items, shipping and taxes.

fields.name: guest
fields.description: Indicates the customer was not logged in when placing the order.

fields.name: itemDiscount
fields.description: Total discount applied to line items.

fields.name: itemQuantity
fields.description: Total quantity of all line items.

fields.name: itemQuantityCancelable
fields.description: Total quantity of cancelable items on the order.

fields.name: itemQuantityCanceled
fields.description: Total quantity of line items canceled.

fields.name: itemQuantityCreditable
fields.description: Total quantity of line items that can be credited.

fields.name: itemQuantityCredited
fields.description: Total quantity of items credited on the order.

fields.name: itemQuantityDeliverable
fields.description: Total quantity of line items that can be fulfilled.

fields.name: itemQuantityDelivered
fields.description: Total quantity of line items that have been fulfilled.

fields.name: itemQuantityGiftcardDeliverable
fields.description: Total quantity of line items that can be fulfilled by gift card. Applies when `item.delivery=giftcard`.

fields.name: itemQuantityInvoiceable
fields.description: Total quantity of items eligible for invoicing on the order.

fields.name: itemQuantityInvoiced
fields.description: Total quantity of items invoiced on the order.

fields.name: itemQuantityReturnable
fields.description: Total quantity of line items that can still be returned.

fields.name: itemQuantityReturned
fields.description: Total quantity of line items that have been returned.

fields.name: itemQuantityShipmentDeliverable
fields.description: Total quantity of line items that can be fulfilled by shipment. Applies when `item.delivery=shipment`.

fields.name: itemQuantitySubscriptionDeliverable
fields.description: Total quantity of line items that can be fulfilled by subscription. Applies when `item.delivery=subscription`.

fields.name: itemShipmentWeight
fields.description: Total shipping weight of all line items.

fields.name: itemTax
fields.description: Total taxes applied to line items.

fields.name: itemTaxIncluded
fields.description: Indicates line item prices include taxes.

fields.name: items
fields.description: List of line items describing the products ordered.

fields.name: metadata
fields.description: Arbitrary data, typically set in a checkout flow to store custom values. See Frontend API for details.

fields.name: number
fields.description: Unique incremental order number, assigned automatically using a format configured in general settings.

fields.name: paid
fields.description: Indicates the order was paid in full. Always `true` when `payment_marked=true`, otherwise depends on the sum of `payments`.

fields.name: promotionIds
fields.description: List of promotion IDs applied to the order.

fields.name: refunds
fields.description: Expandable list of refunds issued for the payment.

fields.name: shipmentDelivery
fields.description: Indicates the order has at least one line item with `delivery=shipment`.

fields.name: shipmentDiscount
fields.description: Shipping discount applied by coupons, promotions, or custom logic.

fields.name: shipmentPrice
fields.description: Total shipping price before discounts.

fields.name: shipmentRating
fields.description: Object describing the shipping services and rates available for the order. Shipping `country` must be set before retrieving shipping rates.

fields.name: shipmentTax
fields.description: Shipping tax amount, if applicable.

fields.name: shipmentTaxIncluded
fields.description: Indicates shipping total includes taxes, if applicable.

fields.name: shipmentTaxIncludedTotal
fields.description: Total shipping price including taxes and discount. Allows for an alternate display style as normally `shipment_total` and `tax_total` are shown separately.

fields.name: shipmentTotal
fields.description: Total shipping price after discounts.

fields.name: shipmentTotalCredited
fields.description: Total shipping price for items credited on the order.

fields.name: shipmentTotalInvoiced
fields.description: Total shipping price for items invoiced on the order.

fields.name: shipping
fields.description: The customer's shipping details. Defaults to `account.shipping`. Updating shipping will also update the corresponding account shipping object.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current status of the order. Can be `pending`, `draft`, `payment_pending`, `delivery_pending`, `hold`, `complete`, or `canceled`.

fields.name: subTotal
fields.description: Sum of all line items before discounts, taxes and shipping.

fields.name: subscriptionDelivery
fields.description: Indicates the order has at least one line item with `delivery=subscription`.

fields.name: taxIncludedTotal
fields.description: Total of taxes applied separately from line items.

fields.name: taxTotal
fields.description: Total tax amount applied to the order including line items and shipping.

fields.name: taxes
fields.description: List of taxes applied to the order.

fields.name: taxesFixed
fields.description: Indicates the order is tax-exempt. Taxes will not be calculated or applied when true.

fields.name: discountEach
fields.description: Discount Amount

fields.name: taxEach
fields.description: Tax Amount

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Payment amount denominated in `currency`. Minimum of 0.01

fields.name: amountRefundable
fields.description: Remaining amount that can be refunded.

fields.name: amountRefunded
fields.description: Amount of the payment that has been refunded.

fields.name: authorized
fields.description: Indicates the payment was authorized before being captured.

fields.name: captured
fields.description: Indicates the payment has been captured.

fields.name: card
fields.description: Credit card details used to make the payment, if applicable.

fields.name: currencyRate
fields.description: Currency percentage used in calculating the fixed amount.

fields.name: gateway
fields.description: ID of the payment gateway that was used to process the payment.

fields.name: method
fields.description: Method of payment. Can be `card`, `account`, `amazon`, `paypal` or any one of the manual methods defined in payment settings.

fields.name: number
fields.description: Unique incremental payment number assigned automatically.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Status of the payment. Can be `pending`, which is awaiting async processing, `error`, `success` or `authorized`.

fields.name: success
fields.description: Indicates the payment was successful. When an error occurs with a payment gateway, this status will be `false` and `error` field will be populated.

types.name: SwellOrderPaymentCard
types.description: Credit card details used to make the payment, if applicable.

fields.name: dateEnd
fields.description: Date the promo ends and is no longer available. When defined, the promo will not be applied after this date.

fields.name: dateStart
fields.description: Date the promo is first available. When defined, the promo will not be valid until after this date and before `date_end`.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief description of the promo, as it may be displayed to customers.

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short descriptive name of the promo.

types.description: Expandable list of refunds issued for the payment.

fields.name: success
fields.description: Indicates the refund was successfully processed

fields.name: canceled
fields.description: Indicates the shipment was canceled.

fields.name: carrier
fields.description: The id of a third-party carrier offering the service, if applicable.

fields.name: carrierName

fields.name: dateEstimated
fields.description: Date the expected shipment is meant to arrive at the destination, if applicable.

fields.name: destination
fields.description: The customer's shipping address.

fields.name: items
fields.description: List of line items describing the products shipped.

fields.name: number
fields.description: Unique incremental shipment number, assigned automatically.

fields.name: origin
fields.description: The shipment origin location.

fields.name: service
fields.description: The id of a shipping service as configured in shipment settings.

fields.name: serviceName
fields.description: Name of the shipping service.

fields.name: trackingCode
fields.description: Tracking code used to identify the shipment, if applicable.

types.name: SwellProduct
types.description: Product

fields.name: attributes
fields.description: An object containing custom attribute key/value pairs.

fields.name: bundle
fields.description: Indicates whether the product is a bundle of other products.

fields.name: bundleItems
fields.description: List of products sold as a bundle. Applicable only when `bundle=true`.

fields.name: crossSells
fields.description: List of products to display as cross-sells on a shopping cart page.

fields.name: description
fields.description: A long-form description of the product. May contain HTML or other markup languages.

fields.name: images
fields.description: List of images depicting the bundle.

fields.name: metaDescription
fields.description: Page description used for search engine optimization purposes.

fields.name: metaTitle
fields.description: Page title used to override product name in storefronts.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Human-friendly name of the product.

fields.name: options
fields.description: Options that allow for variations of the base product. If the option is part of a variant or `required=true`, an option value must be set for the product to be added to a cart.

fields.name: origPrice
fields.description: Reflects the non-sale price of the product

fields.name: price
fields.description: List price used when `sale=false` or `sale_price` is not defined. This value is intended for use via the frontend. See the `purchase_options` array to manage a product's price.

fields.name: prices
fields.description: Price rules determined by cart quantity or customer account group. Overrides `price` and `sale_price` when conditions match.

fields.name: purchaseOptions
fields.description: Configuration of one or more purchase options for the product. Can be `standard` for one-time purchases or `subscription` for a subscription plan. Products can support both purchase options simultaneously.

fields.name: sale
fields.description: Indicates whether the product is on sale. If `true`, the `sale_price` will be used by default when the product is added to a cart.

fields.name: salePrice
fields.description: Sale price used to override list price when `sale=true`.

fields.name: sku
fields.description: Stock keeping unit (SKU) used to track inventory in a warehouse.

fields.name: slug
fields.description: Lowercase, hyphenated identifier typically used in URLs. When creating a product, a `slug `will be generated automatically from the `name`. Maximum length of 1,000 characters.

fields.name: stockLevel
fields.description: Quantity of the product currently in stock (including all variants), based on the sum of the stock entries.

fields.name: stockPurchasable
fields.description: Indicates whether the product's stock is purchasable.

fields.name: stockStatus
fields.description: String indicating the product's stock status for the purpose of ordering. When `stock_purchasable=true`, an order can be placed for this product regardless of current stock status. Otherwise an order submission will be blocked unless stock status is `available`, `preorder`, or `backorder`.

fields.name: stockTracking
fields.description: Indicates whether the product has stock tracking enabled.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: Array of searchable tags to aid in search discoverability.

fields.name: upSells
fields.description: List of products to display as up-sells on a product detail page.

fields.name: variants
fields.description: Expandable list of variants representing unique variations of the product. Each variant is a combination of one or more `options`. For example, Size and Color.

types.name: SwellProductBundleItem
types.description: List of products sold as a bundle. Applicable only when `bundle=true`.

types.name: SwellProductCrossSell
types.description: List of products to display as cross-sells on a shopping cart page.

types.name: SwellProductImage
types.description: List of images depicting the bundle.

types.name: SwellProductOption
types.description: Options that allow for variations of the base product. If the option is part of a variant or `required=true`, an option value must be set for the product to be added to a cart.

fields.name: required
fields.description: Indicates the option requires a value

fields.name: values
fields.description: List of values for this option

fields.name: variant
fields.description: Indicates the option is an aspect of variants

types.name: SwellProductOptionValue
types.description: List of values for this option

fields.name: shipmentWeight
fields.description: Shipment weight added if the option value is selected

types.name: SwellProductPrice
types.description: Price rules determined by cart quantity or customer account group. Overrides `price` and `sale_price` when conditions match.

types.name: SwellProductPurchaseOptions
types.description: Configuration of one or more purchase options for the product. Can be `standard` for one-time purchases or `subscription` for a subscription plan. Products can support both purchase options simultaneously.

types.name: SwellProductUpSell
types.description: List of products to display as up-sells on a product detail page.

types.name: SwellProductVariant
types.description: Expandable list of variants representing unique variations of the product. Each variant is a combination of one or more `options`. For example, Size and Color.

fields.name: sku
fields.description: SKU

types.name: SwellSubscription
types.description: Subscription

fields.name: accountId
fields.description: ID of the subscribed customer's account.

fields.name: active
fields.description: Indicates the subscription is currently active.

fields.name: billing
fields.description: Subscription billing details.

fields.name: billingSchedule
fields.description: Billing schedule for subscription plan.

fields.name: cancelAtEnd
fields.description: When `true`, indicates the subscription was or will be canceled at the end of the billing period.

fields.name: canceled
fields.description: Indicates the subscription was canceled.

fields.name: couponCode
fields.description: Coupon code applied to the subscription. See coupons for details.

fields.name: currencyRate
fields.description: Currency rate used in calculating the fixed amount.

fields.name: dateCanceled
fields.description: Date the subscription was canceled, if applicable.

fields.name: dateOrderPeriodEnd
fields.description: End date for the subscription order period.

fields.name: datePauseEnd
fields.description: Date the subscription was unpaused, if applicable.

fields.name: datePaused
fields.description: Date the subscription was paused, if applicable.

fields.name: datePaymentRetry
fields.description: When automated payment has failed, this is the date when the system will automatically retry.

fields.name: datePeriodEnd
fields.description: End date of the current billing period.

fields.name: datePeriodStart
fields.description: Start date of the current billing period.

fields.name: dateTrialEnd
fields.description: Date the trial period did end in the past or will end in the future. Changing this value can be used to update the billing period of a subscription with or without a trial. For example, to set the monthly billing date to the 1st of the month, update `date_trial_end `to the first of the next month.

fields.name: dateTrialStart
fields.description: Date the trial period started, if applicable.

fields.name: discountTotal
fields.description: Total discount amount.

fields.name: grandTotal
fields.description: Grand total of the next invoice including line items and taxes.

fields.name: invoiceTotal
fields.description: Amount invoiced for the last billing period.

fields.name: itemDiscount
fields.description: Total discount applied to line items.

fields.name: itemTax
fields.description: Total taxes applied to line items.

fields.name: itemTotal
fields.description: Amount invoiced for the last billing period.

fields.name: items
fields.description: List of invoice line items added to the subscription. Recurring items are charged repeatedly, otherwise they are charged on the next invoice and then removed from the subscription.

fields.name: options
fields.description: Plan options matching one or more of `product.options`. When setting this value, specify either option `id` or `name` (case-insensitive) to identify the option.

fields.name: orderId
fields.description: ID of the order that originated the subscription, if applicable.

fields.name: orderSchedule
fields.description: Order schedule for the subscription plan.

fields.name: paid
fields.description: Indicates the last invoice was fully paid.

fields.name: paused
fields.description: Indicates whether or not a subscription is paused.

fields.name: paymentBalance
fields.description: Balance of payments on the invoice for the last billing period. A negative number indicates payment is owed, while a positive balance indicates refund is due. Zero balance indicates the invoice was fully paid.

fields.name: paymentTotal
fields.description: Total amount of payments for the last billing period.

fields.name: planId
fields.description: ID of the subscription plan.

fields.name: planName
fields.description: Name of the subscription plan.

fields.name: price
fields.description: Price of the plan. Plan price can be overridden when creating or updating a subscription.

fields.name: priceTotal
fields.description: Total price of the plan (`price * quantity`).

fields.name: productDiscountEach
fields.description: Total discount amount of the subscription plan, divided by quantity.

fields.name: productDiscountTotal
fields.description: Total discount applied to the subscription plan.

fields.name: productId
fields.description: ID of the subscription plan product.

fields.name: productTaxEach
fields.description: Total tax amount of the subscription plan, divided by quantity.

fields.name: productTaxTotal
fields.description: Total tax applied to the subscription plan.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: Quantity of the plan to charge.

fields.name: recurringDiscountTotal
fields.description: Total recurring discount applied to the subscription including line items.

fields.name: recurringItemDiscount
fields.description: Total discount applied to recurring line items.

fields.name: recurringItemTax
fields.description: Total taxes applied to recurring line items.

fields.name: recurringItemTotal
fields.description: Sum of all recurring line items before discounts and taxes.

fields.name: recurringTaxIncludedTotal
fields.description: Total of taxes applied separately from the subscription plan and recurring line items.

fields.name: recurringTaxTotal
fields.description: Total taxes applied to the subscription including recurring line items.

fields.name: recurringTotal
fields.description: Recurring total of the subscription including line items and taxes.

fields.name: shipping
fields.description: Subscription shipping details.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current status of the subscription. Can be `pending`, `active`, `trial`, `pastdue`, `unpaid`, `canceled`, or `paid`.

fields.name: subTotal
fields.description: Sum of all line items before discounts and taxes.

fields.name: taxIncludedTotal
fields.description: Total of taxes applied separately from the subscription plan and line items.

fields.name: taxTotal
fields.description: Total taxes applied to the subscription including line items.

fields.name: taxes
fields.description: List of taxes applied to the subscription.

fields.name: taxesFixed
fields.description: When true, taxes are not applied to the subscription. When false, taxes are calculated and applied to the subscription.

fields.name: trial
fields.description: Indicates the subscription is in a trial period and the first invoice will be issued on `date_trial_end`.

fields.name: unpaid
fields.description: Indicates the last invoice was marked as unpaid. This occurs automatically after all payment attempts are exhausted, as configured in subscription settings.

fields.name: variantId
fields.description: ID of the subscription plan variant, if applicable.

types.name: SwellSubscriptionBilling
types.description: Subscription billing details.

types.name: SwellSubscriptionBillingSchedule
types.description: Billing schedule for subscription plan.

types.name: SwellSubscriptionItem
types.description: List of invoice line items added to the subscription. Recurring items are charged repeatedly, otherwise they are charged on the next invoice and then removed from the subscription.

types.name: SwellSubscriptionOption
types.description: Plan options matching one or more of `product.options`. When setting this value, specify either option `id` or `name` (case-insensitive) to identify the option.

types.name: SwellSubscriptionOrderSchedule
types.description: Order schedule for the subscription plan.

types.name: SwellSubscriptionShipping
types.description: Subscription shipping details.

types.name: SwellSubscriptionTax
types.description: List of taxes applied to the subscription.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: VARIABLE_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a variable definition.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name, description and optional `specifiedByURL`, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields`, `interfaces`, and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted using the Markdown syntax, as specified by [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/).

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.
